Room.Name: Michael's All-Purpose Repair Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Michael O'Nalle's repair shop in the Waterfront Plaza.
Room.LongDescription: O'Nalle does a lot of work on swords and armors, but can fix just about anything known to man and even a few things not known by man. The price is fairly modest for simple items, but gets rather expensive for exotic and enchanted items. But some things are just irreplacible if they're broken.
